name: Sibanye Stillwater Limited
description: Sibanye Stillwater Limited is a leading global precious metals mining company, focused on the mining and processing of platinum group metals (PGMs) and gold. Founded in 2013 and headquartered in South Africa, Sibanye has rapidly grown to become one of the largest producers of PGMs in the world, operating several mines in South Africa and the United States. The company emphasizes sustainable mining practices and is committed to reducing its environmental impact while maximizing shareholder value. Sibanye's operations cover the full value chain, from mining to refining, and it has invested significantly in technology and innovation to improve efficiency and safety in its operations. The company's diverse portfolio includes both underground and surface operations, allowing for a flexible and resilient business model. In addition to its core mining activities, Sibanye has expanded into the recycling of precious metals, further diversifying its revenue streams. Sibanye's strategic vision includes growth through acquisitions, exploration, and partnerships, positioning it well for future opportunities in the evolving global market for precious metals. The company is dedicated to fostering positive relationships with its stakeholders, including employees, communities, and investors, as it continues to build a sustainable future.
